A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is not a star wars movie. It's a Marvel superhero movie with a star wars skin. It has no substance. It ruins core characters from previous movies. It was horrible. This movie has killed the star wars franchise for me. It's over. I'll keep watching the old stuff and reading the expanded universe and pretend this piece of hot garbage never existed.\n\nThe prequels are honestly better than this piece of trash.
